casebody.data:
BURKHARDT, Respondent, v. NEW YORK EL. R. CO. et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City,

General Term.

December 18, 1895.) Action by Elizabeth Burkhardt against the New York Elevated Railroad Company. Davies, Short & Townsend (Julien T. Davies and George T. Aldrich, of counsel), for appellants. E. W. Tyler and Edward A. Hibbard, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

The judgment should be affirmed, with costs.
